divs: Sighting DetailsWIFE AND I WERE SITTING OUT FRONT WHEN WE SAW IT COMING FROM THE NORTH WEST AT WHAT APPEARED TO BE AROUND TWENTY TO THIRTY THOUSAND FEET HIGH IT WAS TRAVELING FASTER THAN THE COMMERCIAL JETS AND LOWER. IT CONTINUED ON A SOUTH EAST COURSE. I RAN THRU THE HOUSE AND GRABBED MY BINOCULARS AND WENT OUT TO THE BACK DECK. AS IT WENT OVER HEAD I COULD SEE IT WITH THE 7X20 BINOCULARS AND IT WAS JUST A ROUND BRIGHT WHITE LIGHT. NO NOISE, NO VAPOR TRAIL NOTHING. IT CONTINUED ON THE SOUTH EAST COURSE UNTIL IT WENT BEHIND THE TREES.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Summersville
